vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Σίμων [ῐ], ωνος, ὁ,
[Refs], used proverbial of a confederate in evil, οἶδα Σίμωνα καὶ Σ. ἐμέ [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II name of a throw of the dice, [Refs 4th c.BC+]

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.10.4; also called Zealot (KJV: Zelotes) at Luk.6.15; 1x
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Simón: (1) Simón Pedro ; (2) Simón cananita (el Zelote), uno de los doce ; (3) hermano de Jesús (MAT.13:55; MAR.6:3) ; (4) Simón de Cirene (MAT.27:32; MAR.15:21; LUK.23:26) ; (5) padre de Judas Iscariote (JN.6:71; 13:2,26) ; (6) un curtidor de la ciudad de Jope (HCH.9:43; 10:6,17,32b) ; (7) un mago de Samaria (HCH.8:9,13,18,24) ; (8) el leproso (MAT.26:6; MAR.14:3) ; (9) el fariseo (LUC.7:40,43,44)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西門
1) 使徒彼得
2) 奮銳黨的西門
3) 賣耶穌的猶大的父親
4) 一名法師 (徒 8章)
5) 一名硝皮匠 (徒 10章)
6) 一位法利賽人 (路 7:40-44)
7) 幫耶穌背十架的古利奈人
8) 耶穌的弟弟 (太 13:55; 可 6:3)
9) 長大痲瘋的西門
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
西门
1) 使徒彼得
2) 奋锐党的西门
3) 卖耶稣的犹大的父亲
4) 一名法师 (徒 8章)
5) 一名硝皮匠 (徒 10章)
6) 一位法利赛人 (路 7:40-44)
7) 帮耶稣背十架的古利奈人
8) 耶稣的弟弟 (太 13:55; 可 6:3)
9) 长大痲疯的西门

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.13.55;
son of: Joseph (G2501) and Mary (G3137);
brother of: Jesus (G2424), James (G2385I), Joseph (G2500) and Jude (G2455I)
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.26.6

A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.27.32;
father of: Alexander (G0223), Rufus (G4504)
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.7.40

A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Jhn.6.71;
father of: Judas (G2455H)
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.8.9
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.8.13

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.4.18;
son of: John (G2491K);
brother of: Andrew (G0406); also called Simon frequently; Simeon (Var, KJV, NIV: Simon) at Act.15.14; 1xCephas at Jhn.1.42; 1x3.22; 9.5; 15.5; 1x2.9,11,14; Bar-Jonah (KJV: Bar-Jona; NIV: son of Jonah) at Mat.16.17;
